messages.welcome: Hello, {user_mention}! Welcome to our course platform. Tap the button below to start enrollment.
messages.enroll_prompt: Tap 'Enroll Now' to begin the registration process.
messages.ask_phone: Thank you! Now, please provide your Ethiopian phone number. Example: 0912345678 or +251912345678
messages.invalid_phone: That doesn't seem to be a valid Ethiopian phone number format. Please try again. Example: 0912345678 or +251912345678
messages.ask_course: Great! Now, please select the course you would like to enroll in:
messages.payment_instructions:
You have selected: {course_name}.

Please make a payment of {course_price} ETB to the following bank account and send us a photo of the receipt.

{bank_details}

After you have made the payment, please send the photo of the receipt to me in this chat. You can now send the image directly.
messages.enrollment_success: Thank you for submitting your enrollment form! Your payment is now pending verification. We will notify you once it's confirmed.
messages.verification_success_student: Congratulations, {user_name}! Your payment for the course has been verified. You now have access to our exclusive course content! Click the link below to join https://t.me/+6y3yxn1aNvc4MGM0
messages.verification_success_admin: Student {user_name} ({user_id}) verified and added to the course group.
messages.verification_fail_student: We encountered an issue verifying your payment. Please ensure your receipt is clear or contact support if you believe this is an error.
messages.certificate_eligibility: Congratulations, {user_mention}! You have completed the waiting period for your course: {course_name}. You can now apply for a certificate for a fee of {certificate_price} ETB. Click the button below to start the process!
messages.certificate_ask:
You have selected to apply for the certificate for the '{course_name}' course. The cost is {certificate_price} ETB.

Please make a payment to the following bank account and send us a photo of the receipt.

{bank_details}

After you have made the payment, please send the photo of the receipt to me in this chat.
messages.certificate_pending: Thank you! Your certificate payment is now pending verification. We will notify you once it's confirmed.
messages.certificate_verified_student: Congratulations, {user_name}! Your certificate payment has been verified. We will now prepare your certificate.
messages.certificate_denied_student: There was an issue verifying your certificate payment. Please try again or contact support if you believe this is an error.
messages.course_expiry_student:
Hello {user_mention},

Your access to the '{course_name}' course has come to an end. We hope you enjoyed the content! If you'd like to rejoin, you can click the button below to re-enroll.
messages.course_expiry_admin: AUTOMATED REMOVAL: Student {user_name} ({user_id}) has been automatically removed from the '{course_name}' group because their access period has ended.
